page.title: 11Arts and Crafts
page.content: The area has always been strong in this field and the census return of 1861 for Islip lists 7 stonemasons 6 carpenters 4 shoemakers 1 fancy netter 1 lacemaker 2 tailors 3 harness makers 1 glovemaker and 1 artist in chalks .At the present time there is in Islip an Antiques shop,a small businesss which deals exclusively in household carpentry, a cabinet maker,a lace maker, a silver smith,and a stonemason.There is also an art group called the Otmoor group which was established recently by three local water colour artists,Will North of Oddington,Geoffrey Clarke and Colin Tuffrey of Islip.The group hold an annual exhibition in the Islip Village Hall which attracts viewers and buyers from all over Oxfordshire and sometimes further afield.
